section.name: SemanTag
section.p: The SemanTag project develops a set of xml-tags that allow you to create and process semantically enriched data. Learn more...

section.name: Status
section.p: SemanTag is in a very early state. It is alpha-Software, the current release is 0.1

section.name: Download
section.p: SemanTag is released as either binary- or source-distribution. Both distributions are available on Semantag's sourceforge download site.
